snippet: The Red Hook Criterium has evolved into one of New York City’s biggest cycling events and will have races at the Brooklyn Cruise Terminal, Brooklyn Navy Yard, in Barcelona and in Milan.
abstract: Red Hook Criterium bike race expands into a four-race series; besides March 30 race at Brooklyn Cruise Terminal, race's organizer David Trimble will run similar race on June 8 at Brooklyn Navy Yard; Trimble will also have race in Barcelona, Spain, on Aug 24 and one in Milan in October; points will accumulate and overall champion will be named.
lead_paragraph: The Red Hook Criterium has evolved into one of New York City’s biggest cycling events and will have races at the Brooklyn Cruise Terminal, Brooklyn Navy Yard, in Barcelona and in Milan.

headline.seo: Red Hook Criterium Is Now a 4-Race Cycling Series
headline.main: Brooklyn Event Expanding Into a Four-Race Series
headline.print_headline: Brooklyn Event Expanding Into a Four-Race Series
